#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
                
                 char c;
                 long int m,n,k;
                 scanf("%c",&c);
                 scanf("%ld%ld",&n,&k);
                 int a[n],i=0;
                 m=n;
                 while(m--)
                 {
                      scanf("%d",&a[i]);
                      i++;
                   }
                  int j,kk;
                  sort(a,a+n,greater<int>());
                
                 long long int summ=0;
                for(j=0;j<k;) 
                {
                summ=summ+a[j]; 
                j++;                
                }
                printf("%lld\n",summ);
                 
    }
 
    return 0;
    }
